landing.heroDescription: Join the ultimate gamified learning platform. Master AI, Web Dev, Cybersecurity, and more through challenges, competitions, and collaboration with a global community.
landing.featuresDescription: From personalized AI assistance to global competitions, TechHive provides all the tools you need to become a top-tier developer.
landing.skillArenasDesc: Battle through AI, Cyber, Web, and GameDev arenas with time-bound challenges
landing.aiCopilotDesc: Get personalized help with code, debugging, and learning from our AI assistant
landing.techClansDesc: Join or create clans for hackathons, competitions, and collaborative projects
landing.globalLeaderboardsDesc: Compete with developers worldwide and climb the ranks
landing.projectsHubDesc: Build, share, and collaborate on open-source projects
landing.mentorVerseDesc: Connect with mentors matched to your interests and skill level
landing.testimonial: TechHive transformed how I learn programming. The gamified challenges and clan competitions keep me motivated every day.
landing.joinDescription: Create your free account and start your journey to becoming a top developer. Track your progress, earn badges, and compete globally.

dashboard.readyToLevel: Ready to level up your skills today?
dashboard.completeQuests: Complete quests to earn XP and rewards
